name: Tesla's Tower: The Wardenclyffe Mystery
description: Fix the past, save the color!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 451 MB available space

reviews.review_text: One of the best games of this genre I have played. I would buy games made by these people again in a second.
